actions.text: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment restricts credit card issuers from making adverse reports to credit rating agencies regarding deployed military service members and disabled veterans during the first two years of their disability.
purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 111-92 to restrict credit card issuers from making adverse reports to credit rating agencies regarding deployed military service members and disabled veterans during the first two years of their disability.
